name: Studious
description:
Studious is aimed at young kids. Be it from school or home, education is pillar on which the future of society relies.

My aim is to make learning an easier and fun experience, by providing a platform on which teachers will be able to craft their home assignments on to fit the need of their students.

The player explores rooms in search for his notes, when he finds them he gets some bits of information which he will need to pass the exam presented to him each level.

Future updates will include a level crafting tool.

Learn & play!
